articles.title: Yedomon Ange Bovys Zoclanclounon
articles.contents:
Bio
I am from Benin, a western African country. I am currently doing a Ph.D. at Jeonbuk National University in the Republic of South Korea. I am working in plant genomics domain with a focus on high-quality genome construction of both wild and cultivated sesame. My work is highly dominated by bioinformatics. I love playing with the programming languages such as perl, java with a great interest in R.
Education
Jeonbuk National University | Jeonju, South Korea
Ph. D. in Plant Biotechnology | March 2020 - Present
University Cheikh Anta Diop of Dakar | Senegal, West Africa
MSc in Crop Sciences and Crop Protection | September 2015 - March 2017
Experience
National Institute of Agricultural Science | South Korea | Research-Assistant | August 2018 - February 2020
Centre d’Etudes Régional pour l’Amélioration de l’Adaptation à la Sècheresse | Research-Assistant | August 2017 - February 2018
